title: Uncontrolled high blood pressure puts over a billion people at risk
summary: The World Health Organization (WHO) today released its second Global hypertension report, showing that 1.4 billion people lived with hypertension in 2024, yet just over one in five have it under control either through medication or addressing modifiable health risks.

title: Amended International Health Regulations enter into force
summary: Today marks a milestone in global health governance as the amendments to the International Health Regulations (IHR) enter into force. This reflects a renewed global commitment to cooperation in the face of public health emergencies, shaped by hard-earned lessons of the COVID-19 pandemic.

title: WHO urges cost effective solutions on NCDs and mental health amidst slowing progress
